Package Game.enemy

Class EnemyBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.enemy.EnemyBasic
  • public class EnemyBasic
extends java.lang.Object
    EnemyBasic class allows to create, update and draw the game enemies.
    Since:
    March 2019

      • EnemyBasic

        public EnemyBasic​(double xPos,
                  double yPos,
                  int rows,
                  int columns,
                  EnemyBulletHandler bulletHandler)
        Constructor that creates a new Enemy object in an specified X,Y coordinate.
        Parameters:
        xPos - X Position where the Enemy object is going to be created.
        yPos - Y Position where the Enemy object is going to be created.
        rows - Enemy height.
        columns - Enemy width.
        bulletHandler - Creates and manage bullets
